name: Sum all integers from 1 to n [COBOL]
description:
Take a number `NUMBER-1` and return sum of `1` to `NUMBER-1`.

lowest number tested is 0

# Note :

Any help is appreciated in improving the random test suite 

# IMPORTANT (MUST READ): 

Mostly copied from discord discussions :

Currently Cobol katas dont have random test cases and therefore can't be placed as translations due to said issues.

so there was only 1 kata (a lvl 8 with no random tests and 200 fixed tests, that was likely a duplicate) and 2 translations (both having 10 copy pasted tests that had random vals in them, but not much)

This kata is here mostly to debug the random test suite (alternately check if its possible at all to begin with for all vals).

Once fixed, the kata will be retired.

As it stands there are way too many things that can and probably need to be updated in tests
